Title: Stan & Ollie
Writer: Jeff Pope, 'A.J.' Marriot (inspired by the book 'Laurel & Hardy - The British Tours' by)
Actors: Steve Coogan, John C. Reilly, Shirley Henderson, Nina Arianda
Plot: Laurel and Hardy, the world's most famous comedy duo, attempt to reignite their film careers as they embark on what becomes their swan song - a grueling theatre tour of post-war Britain.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 6 wins & 29 nominations.
Production: Baby Cow Films, Sonesta Films, Entertainment One, Fable Pictures
